name: One Gun: Cat
description:
The age of weapons and sword. World of One Gun was attacked by evil monsters. The fate of the world hangs in the balance!
Protect the world of One Gun from evil invaders!
You have to become a hero and you will be helped by strong cats.

Explore the dungeons, buy insane weapons, shoot monsters! Intuitive simple control, incredibly smooth and exciting gameplay and a lot of different tricks. This is the best shooter for mobile devices.

Features:
* Enjoy stylish doodle graphics
* Many hours of gameplay
* Enjoy the pleasure of destroying enemies
* Explore different worlds
* Get a lot of different weapons
* Hire more cats to increase production at the mine
* hero is a cat!
* hashes can only be obtained from bosses, missions, gates

Subscribe to us!
Our site: https://erowdev.com/
